title: Remove game outcomes from eSports Video Replays
body:
So tired of coming home from work to watch the replays of the matches that occurred and having the outcome spoiled.

There has to be a better way!

replies.body: I agree.  When you go to watch and you see TEam X winner 2-0, it takes much of the excitement away.
or at least have the black spoiler bar over them

I love watching esports, but I dont unless it is live (which is rare due to work) because of the spoiler. Youtube is better, but it is harder to find the matches as they happen, or even worse, I have to watch the replay live stream, and I miss half the match.
I usually lurk, but this is big enough for me to make a post about.
